component.name: S3Drive
component.summary: Convert S3, SFTP, WebDAV or Rclone back-end into your encrypted storage

description.p: S3Drive is an easy-to-use software client that converts vast range of protocols (S3, WebDav, FTP etc.) and cloud providers into your personal encrypted file storage with comprehensive syncing and backup options.

There are dozens of providers where you can get a free tier account. You can then decide to pay only for additionally used storage or you can fully control your storage by self-hosting S3 or any other back-end.
You can start with the simplest option and make adjustments whenever you're ready. Your files are encrypted before they leave your device, so no one beside you can access them. Not even us.

Features: Rclone compatible E2E encryption, Drive mount, Sync modes (copy, move, sync, two-way), Content and filename encryption, Secure sharing via encrypted link, Multiple accounts support, Manage files & directories (open, preview, download, copy, delete, rename, folder upload etc.), Preview different file formats (pdf, markdown, txt, audio, video), Simple text editor, Search within directories, Object Lock support, File versioning (delete & restore), Light and dark themes
Supported protocols: S3, WebDAV, SFTP, SMB, FTP, HTTP
Personal storage: Google Drive, Google Photos, Dropbox, Box, Microsoft OneDrive, pCloud, Proton Drive, Koofr

S3 clouds: AWS S3, Backblaze B2, Synology C2, Cloudflare R2, Google Cloud Storage, Wasabi, Linode, IDrive e2, Storj, Scaleway, DigitalOcean Spaces
Self-hosted: MinIO, SeaweedFS, GarageFS, Openstack Swift S3, Ceph, Zenko CloudServer
Full list: https://docs.s3drive.app/setup/providers
Available on: Android, iOS, macOS, Windows, Linux, Web. Browser web client: https://web.s3drive.app
If you like what we're doing and would like to support us, please consider upgrading your plan and leave us a review if you haven't already. More information: https://docs.s3drive.app/contributing
